degree_grantor: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
description_abstract: The purpose of this research is to develop  an established assortment-planning model identifying procedures and activities  for women's wear retail buyers.  This research built three assortment-planning  models: (a) a conceptual moddel based on  a secondary data analysis, (b) a practical-use  model based on interviews using questionnaire  and a set of activity cards, (c) the suggested  model based on the conncetion analysis of the previous two models.
